__comment__: Copy this file to `i2p_config.json` (repo root). It is for NON-sensitive settings. Priority: shell env > .env > i2p_config.json > defaults. Secrets (e.g. SILICONFLOW_API_KEY) should go to `.env`, not here.

logging.__comment__: Run logging writes a folder per run: log/run_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS_<pid>_<rand>/. Set enable=false to disable logging entirely.

critic.__comment__: Anchored Multi-Agent Critic JSON strictness. strict_json=true means: invalid JSON -> retry -> still invalid => fail the run (no silent fallback).

pass.__comment__: Pattern-aware pass rule based on the pattern's full real score10 distribution (NOT anchors). Default scheme: 2 of 3 roles >= q75 and avg >= q50.

anchors.__comment__: Anchor selection + deterministic scoring knobs. Usually keep defaults unless you know what you're doing.

llm.__comment__: LLM endpoint/model settings. The API key is read from env var SILICONFLOW_API_KEY in `.env` (do not put it here).

results.__comment__: Aggregate final artifacts to repo-root results/run_.../ for better UX.
